content.query:
SELECT 'NYC_Payroll_AGENCY_MD' TableName, COUNT(*) TotalRecords FROM dbo.[NYC_Payroll_AGENCY_MD]
UNION
SELECT 'NYC_Payroll_Data' TableName, COUNT(*) TotalRecords FROM dbo.[NYC_Payroll_Data]
UNION
SELECT 'NYC_Payroll_EMP_MD' TableName, COUNT(*) TotalRecords FROM dbo.[NYC_Payroll_EMP_MD]
UNION
SELECT 'NYC_Payroll_TITLE_MD' TableName, COUNT(*) TotalRecords FROM dbo.[NYC_Payroll_TITLE_MD]
